job_tasks.phrase: helpt bij het trainen van generatieve AI-modellen
job_tasks.justification: The phrase directly mentions training generative AI models, which is a core aspect of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Het maken en beantwoorden van vragen met betrekking tot informatica om AI-modellen te helpen trainen.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves creating and answering computer science questions to aid in training AI models, fitting the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Het evalueren en rangschikken van code die door AI-modellen wordt gegenereerd.
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and ranking AI-generated code is a form of model feedback and refinement, falling under 'Modeling'.

job_tasks.phrase: ervaren software-engineer die zijn of haar expertise in codering wil inzetten om AI-modellen te trainen
job_tasks.justification: The job is seeking a software engineer to leverage their coding expertise, implying software development skills are needed.

job_tasks.phrase: programmeurs om te helpen bij het trainen van generatieve AI-modellen.
job_tasks.justification: The role is looking for programmers to assist with training, indicating a need for programming and development skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Er is geen eerdere ervaring met AI vereist.
De projecten bevatten meestal afgebakende, zeer gevarieerde problemen
flexibele werkuren, zodat je kunt werken wanneer het jou het beste uitkomt.

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly focuses on training and interacting with generative AI models, including evaluating their output. The tasks involve creating and answering questions related to computer science to aid this training, aligning with the specialized skills for a GenAI Engineer.
